description:
Yacht Deluxe is an exciting dice game for the Palm Pre and Palm Pixi. You may also know this game as Cheerio, Yot, Yam, or General. Players take turns rolling five dice to score big with a straight, full house, four of a kind, Yacht, or Chance combination. 

Challenge your friends and family or go head to head with up to 3 clever computer players. Yacht Deluxe also supports Solitaire play. Customize your game by naming your human and computer players, choosing from 16 player images, and setting computer difficulty. 

Yacht Deluxe Features: 
-Play versus the computer with up to 3 skilled AI opponents 
-Up to 4 human players
-Customize player names and choose from 16 player images
-4 Levels of computer difficulty
-How to Play and Tips
-Sound Effects enhance gaming experience
-Save your game where you left off

Try Yacht Deluxe today! 

Better Day Wireless. Better Apps. Better Value.
